duties_responsibilities.duty: Assess, diagnose, repair, and/or replace damaged or worn parts on a variety of vocational/utility trucks & equipment.
Provide repair and maintenance to medium/heavy-duty trucks, with a background in hydraulics and electrical as a plus.
Prepare and maintain accurate records of parts, services, and labor to track costs and ensure quality standards are achieved.
Submit all work/repair orders to a supervisor for approval to ensure budgets are maintained.
Perform all duties in accordance with best practices for a safe work environment.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent Vocational Technical School or Military Wheeled Mechanic or related training a plus Must hold a valid driver’s license Must have your own tools
